name: @vidalii/vidalii-backend
description: Example integration of MikroORM into Koa (in typescript)
author: Martin Adamek

scripts.publish:public:patch: tsc && npm version patch && ts-node publish.complement && npm publish 'dist' --access public
scripts.publish:public:minor: tsc && npm version minor && ts-node publish.complement && npm publish 'dist' --access public
scripts.publish:public:major: tsc && npm version major && ts-node publish.complement && npm publish 'dist' --access public
